overview: In just three and a half years they’ve had three No. 1 albums, ten UK Top 10 singles including three No. 1’s, won two BRIT Awards, sold over 7 million albums and 4 million singles, undertaken hundreds of TV interviews and generated acres of print coverage. “Best Of” DVD features all the hit videos plus a host of special extras, making it a must for all Blue fans. DVD includes full length band commentary, Blue Jukebox (program your own tracks), random play option, sing along with Blue, bonus hidden features, animated galleries, “Guilty” instrumental, “Breathe Easy” instrumental, “Bubblin” instrumental, exclusive interview, tour dates, DVD trailers and more.
title: Best Of Blue
